name: Manufacturer Name
description: String containing the self-describing name of the manufacturer. “VEYE”

name: Model Name
description:
Product Model Code.
0x0662: GX-MIPI-IMX662

name: Sensor Name
description:
Sensor Model:
0x662: IMX662-AAQR

name: Serial Number
description: factory number

name: Device Version
description:
Firmware version number. The high 16 bits are the Control version and the low 16 bits are the Logic version.
For example, 0x01020304 means Control version is 1.2 and Logic version is 3.4.

name: Factory Param
description:
All parameters restored to factory default values.
This operation will erase the system flash and rewrite it. Please ensure that the power is not interrupted during the operation.
Additionally, it is recommended not to perform frequent factoryparam operations.

name: Param save to flash
description:
Save all parameters to flash, and they will not be lost when power off.
This operation will erase the system flash and rewrite it. Please ensure that the power is not interrupted during the operation.
Additionally, it is recommended not to perform frequent paramsave operations.

name: System reboot
description: Reboot the camera.

name: Time stamp
description: Time after system startup in Milliseconds.

name: Error Code
description: Reserved

name: Format Cap
description:
The module supports the capability set of data formats. Each bit represents a data Format, similar to the definition of the Pixel Format register.
bit0: Mono8
bit1: Mono10
bit2: Mono12
bit3: Mono14 (reserved)
bit4: UYVY
bit5: RGB888
bit6: Temp (reserved)
bit7: YUYV

name: ReadModeCap
description:
Capbility of read mode supported by the camera.
bit0: Normal
bit1: binning mode
bit2: subsampling mode

name: WorkMode Cap
description:
Capbility of trigger mode supported by the camera.
bit0: Video streaming mode
bit1: Normal trigger mode.
bit4: Multi-camera synchronization mode

name: LaneNumCap
description:
The number of MIPI lanes supported by the camera .
The lower to higher bits correspond to the supported capabilities for 1 lane, 2 lanes, 3 lanes, and 4 lanes, respectively.
For example, 0x2 indicates support for 2 lanes, and 0xA indicates support for both 2 lanes and 4 lanes.

name: Temperature K
description: The sensor's temperature value, in Kelvin, is 100 times the current temperature.

name: VideoModeCap
description:
Product resolution mode capability.
Bit0: ROI model.
Bit1: Preset Mode mode

name: VideoModeNum
description: The GX series uses the resolution mode scheme by default and does not use the ROI scheme. The number of supported image modes. Up to 8 types are supported.

name: VidoeMode_WH1
description: In the first mode, the width is represented by the upper 16 bits and the height by the lower 16 bits.

name: VideoMode_Param1
description:
The frame rate and read mode of the first pattern. The high 8 bits are reserved, the middle 8 bits define the read mode, and the low 16 bits represent the frame rate.
Read mode definition:
0: ordinary
1: binning
2: subsampling

name: VidoeMode_WH2
description: The width and height of the second mode

name: VideoMode_Param2
description: The frame rate and reading method of the second mode.

name: VidoeMode_WH3
description: The width and height of the third mode

name: VideoMode_Param3
description: The frame rate and reading method of the third mode.

name: VidoeMode_WH4
description: The width and height of the fourth mode

name: VideoMode_Param4
description: The frame rate and reading mode of the fourth pattern.

name: VidoeMode_WH5
description: The width and height of the fifth mode

name: VideoMode_Param5
description: The frame rate and reading method of the fifth mode.

name: VidoeMode_WH6
description: The width and height of the sixth mode

name: VideoMode_Param6
description: The frame rate and reading method of the sixth mode.

name: VidoeMode_WH7
description: The width and height of the seventh mode

name: VideoMode_Param7
description: The frame rate and reading method of the seventh mode.

name: VidoeMode_WH8
description: The width and height of the eighth mode

name: VideoMode_Param8
description: The frame rate and reading method of the eighth mode.

name: Work Mode
description:
0: Video streaming mode
1: Normal trigger mode.
4: Multi-camera synchronization mode.
See product manual for details.

name: Trigger Source
description:
Get/Set Trigger Source:
0: Software trigger mode.
1: Hardware trigger mode.
Effective in Trigger mode 1 and 2 only.

name: Trigger Number
description: Trigger mode, the number of trigger frames in a single instance is represented by bit[7:0], which is valid within the legal range of 1 to 255. The default value is 1.

name: Trigger Interval
description: Trigger interval in normal trigger mode, in microseconds. Range: [0.0xFFFFFF]

name: Trigger Software
description: Software trigger command, write 1 for one trigger.

name: Trigger Count
description:
Trigger count statistics.
The high 16 bits indicate the number of trigger loss, and the low 16 bits indicate the total number of triggers.
Write 1 to clear the count.

name: I2C ADDR
description: I2c address. Range[0x03,0x77].

name: Non discontinuous mode
description:
Indicates whether the clock lan of the mipi signal is in continuous clock mode.
0: discontinuous mode
1: continuous mode

name: Slave mode
description:
It takes effect in the synchronous mode of the GX series.
In the synchronous mode, the role of the camera.
0: Master mode
1: Slave mode

name: Sensor Frame Count
description: The number of frames output by the sensor. Cyclic counting.

name: Out Frame Count
description: The number of frames output by the camera module. Cyclic counting.

name: Min Trigger cycle
description:
Minimum trigger signal period, in microseconds (µs), with 0 indicating an invalid value.
In pulse trigger mode, it represents the minimum interval between the end of the previous trigger level and the next trigger signal.

name: Day night mode
description:
0: Color mode
1: Black and white mode
2: External Trigger Mode

name: IRCUT dir
description: ircut Direction reversal

name:
day night
trigger pin polarity
description: The trigger pin polarity is reversed day and night. The default low level indicates night. When this value is set to 1, the high level indicates night.

name: IRCUT Timer
description: Whether to enable the IRCUT periodic control; if enabled, perform IRCUT control according to the default cycle; if not enabled, only perform one control when the mode is switched.

name: Test Image Selector
description:
GX Series
1: Vertical color stripes

name: Pixel Format
description:
Pixel format
0: Mono8
1: Mono10
2: Mono12
3: Mono14(reserved)
4: UYVY
5: RGB888
6: Temp(reserved)
7: YUYV

name: Sensor Width
description: The maximum width supported by the sensor

name: Sensor Height
description: The maximum height supported by sensor

name: MaxFrame Rate
description:
The maximum frame rate supported in the current mode.
The register value is 100 times the frame rate.

name: Current Width
description: Current Width.

name: Current Height
description: Current Height.

name: Image Direction
description:
Image orientation:
0: normal
1: mirror
2: flip
3: flip&mirror

name: VideoMode
description: For cameras that select width, height, and frame rate using the VideoMode mode, which mode to choose. The corresponding capability set is VideomodeCap. The range is [0-7].

name: Read Mode
description:
Read mode:
0: Normal
1: 2x2Binning
2: Subsampling

name: Lane Num
description:
Configuration of the number of Lans for outputting mipi signals.
2: 2lane default value
4: 4lane

name: MIPI Datarate
description: The MIPI datarate for each lane, measured in Kbps.

name: Min Width
description: The minimum width supported by the camera.

name: Min Height
description: The minimum height supported by the camera.

name: Min Frame Rate
description: The minimum framerate supported by the camera. The value is 10000 times the actual framerate.

name: Framerate_EX
description: The extended register of the Framerate register, where the value is 10,000 times the actual frame rate.

name: Exposure Mode
description:
Exposure Type
0: Manual exposure
2: Automatic exposure

name: Target Brightness
description: Target brightness for automatic exposure. Range[0,255]

name: AE Strategy
description:
Automatic exposure strategy,
0: Bright Area Priority mode 
1: Dark zone priority mode

name: ME Time
description: Manual exposure time,effective in ME mode. Range[16,1000000]. Note1.Unit: microseconds.

name: AE MAX Time
description: Maximum exposure time in AE mode.Range[16,1000000].Unit: microseconds.

name: Exp Time
description: Current exposure time.Unit: microseconds.

name: Manual Gain
description: Manual gain, ,effective in MG mode.

name: AG Max Gain
description: Maximum value of auto gain.

name: Cur Gain
description: Current Gain.

name: WB Mode
description:
White balance type:
0: Manual White Balance
2: Automatic White Balance

name: AWB Color temp min
description: White balance minimum color temperature (K)

name: AWB Color temp max
description: White balance maximum color temperature (K)

name: MWB Rgain
description: Manual white balance R gain [0,4095]

name: MWB Bgain
description: Manual white balance B gain [0,4095]

name: Color Temp
description: Current color temperature (k)

name: Cur Rgain
description: Current white balance R gain [0, 4095]

name: Cur Bgain
description: Current white balance B gain [0, 4095]

name: AE Min Time
description:
Automatic minimum exposure time
Range: 16 to 1,000,000 (unit: microseconds)

name: Anti flicker enable
description: Whether to enable the antiflicker function

name: Anti flicker Freq
description: Anti-flicker frequency

name: WDR Enable
description: Enable the WDR function or not

name: WDR strength
description: WDR intensity [0 - 255]

name: Sharppen strength
description: Sharpening intensity [0 - 255]

name: 2D denoise strength
description: 2D noise reduction intensity [0 - 255]

name: 3D denoise strength
description: 3D noise reduction intensity [0 - 255]

name: Saturation
description: Saturation [0 - 100]

name: Contrast
description: Contrast [0 - 100]

name: Slow Shutter
description: Is the automatic frame reduction function enabled, It only takes effect in the automatic exposure mode + video stream mode. Corresponding to Aemode, is it in the fixed frame rate mode or the automatic frame reduction mode

name: Slow Shutter GainTh
description: The gain threshold at which automatic frame rate reduction begins. Measured in 0.1 dB units.

name: Lens Distortion Correction
description: Lens Distortion Correction [0-255], abbreviated as LDC, with 0 indicating disable.

name: Dehaze strength
description: Defogging intensity [0-255], 0 indicates off.

name: Gamma Selection
description:
The GX series has preset gamma options, with different values representing different gamma settings:
0: Gamma off, that is, linear format.
1: Default gamma.
2: gamma_1.6
3: gamma_1.8
4: gamma_2.0
5: gamma_2.2
6: Style 1
7: Style 2
8: Style 3
9: Style 4
10: Style 5
11: Style 6
12: User-defined gamma (TODO)

name: DRC strength
description: Digital wide dynamic range. Range [0-255], 0 indicates off.

name: Trigger Delay
description:
Trigger delay. Trigger delay. Effective in both soft trigger and hard trigger modes.
range: 0 to 1000000 (unit: microsecond)

name: Trigger Edge
description:
0: Rising edge
1: Falling edge

name: Exposure Delay
description:
Exposure delay, i.e. the time to turn on the Strobe signal in advance.
range: 0 to 1000000 (unit: microsecond)

name: GPIO1_OutSelect
description:
[2:0]
000: Strobe
001: UserOut
010: TriggerWait, waiting for the trigger signal. The inverse state of the busy signal. (Supported by the GX series)
Others: Keep

name: GPIO1 Reverse
description: OUT_IO1 signal reversal.
